name: Squirrel Scramble (bradlol)
description:
Squirrel Scramble is my very first completed game ever! I made it in 2 days while participating in FranklyFied & tiimo's Game Jam #26.

Guide your cyclopse player throughout the various levels whilst using your magic abilities to eliminate all the squirrels along the way

Controls 

Mouse Pointer- Move around and guide your character

Space- Throw rocks at your target

Q - Utilise your first chosen ability

E - Utilise your second choses ability

Escape - Quit to main menu

Theming

You play as a cyclopse, fitting the theme of You are the Monster

The special object of this game jam was cards. So I implimented customizable magical cards that grant the player special abilities.

My game does NOT condone violence against animals,  these are ficticious squirrels and are not being hurt :)

Credit

I used art assets from limezu here on itch.io
